title: Jade of the Eight Gates
summary: 'Jucho', a government official manipulating the young king from behind, begins to express his ambition to oust the king and take real power and plots a ruse. Meanwhile, 'Handong', a member of the emperor's special unit 'Surajo', meets the boy 'Jinbaek' in a village he entered to following the traces of his disappeared colleague, and learns that his colleague met his end in this village. These two people who fought with the people sent by Jucho knew that they needed eight jades to rescue Jinbaek grandfather who was held hostage and to stop Jucho's ambition, they started the journey together...

title: The Man Who Wears Magnolia
summary:
Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.

Volume 1: 17-21

- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita, 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**
A strange world where aliens have taken over the human world, and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.

- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa, 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**
To Sasaki, his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true, no matter how low the odds. Yet one day, trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation, Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.

- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku, 恋は盲目)**
A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?

- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**
A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.

Volume 2: 22-26

- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody, 人魚ラプソディ)**
In a world where sirens are common, the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea, when a strange siren approaches him…

- Chapter 2. **"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou, 目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**
A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!

- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta, 予言のナユタ)**
A tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world, and her brother.

- Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane, 妹の姉)**
A story about sisters aspiring to be artists.

title: Will You Marry Me Under Contract, Your Highness?
summary: Jenesia, a brilliant sorcerer, was murdered after witnessing an affair between her fiancé and her best friend. With her final breath, Jenesia managed to use her magical powers to turn back time. Reliving her past, will Jenesia finally be able to find happiness?

title: The Princess in The Henhouse
summary:
In the Fight Empire, where strength and beauty were valued above all else, even the princesses led armies and spent their days in battle. This is a story of one particular day in the lives of two princesses born into this nation.

[Part of the 10th anniversary Jump+ One-shot collection](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2019/)

title: Cynical Master Raises Rabbit Spirit
summary:
Medical student Ruan Ruan becomes a rabbit spirit, and meets a cold and blood-sucking fox spirit. Their first time meeting, she died under his dagger. Who would guess that she would come back alive the next day?

In order to survive in this supernatural world full of masters, she became the fox’s follower. She does laundry, cooks, and calms him down when the looses his temper. During tje full moon she becomes his portable blood bank. So many worrisome matters…

Cynical Bloodthirsty Fox x Timid Cute White Bunny

title: My Benefactor Is Not a Scholar
summary: Kaylen came across a major setback in her life and headed back to the countryside to run away from all of this, one day she rescued a fox when she wandered around in the forest after she got drunk. But she didin't know that she will meet this "fox" again soon! Kaylen's works were taken away by the powerful men, so she tried to take her revenge through her new novel. Just when her revenge was blocked, she met her strongest alliance, a little dumb and beautiful man with a strong and a smuggling body! Wait, why does he look so familiar?

title: Another Heaven
summary:
An angel made a mistake, resulting in Shiihara Daiki’s death. In order to hide the mistake, he was then sent to a different world. The angel will grant him one wish as a payment for keeping it a secret. Daiki asked for a Heavenly Castle floating in the sky without hesitation.  
Suddenly a floating castle appeared in the new world, which causes confusion amongst the people. They attempt to contact Daiki in various ways. A country tries to steal it by force, while another seeks to befriend him. What in the world would Daiki do?

title: Potion Witch
summary:
"I want you to make me a love potion."

The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.

If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet…

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://crossinfworld.com/Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)

title: I’m retiring from the role of a wife!
summary: Ayukawa Honami (30), once a child prodigy who took the entertainment world by storm, has now retired from show business and is living a happy married life as a mother of one. At the urging of her husband, who runs a talent agency, she allows her daughter to debut as a child actor. However, during a commercial shoot, her daughter becomes entangled in a troubling incident. When Honami discovers that the accident was caused by her husband's infidelity and a grudge from her own child actor days, she decides to make a comeback as a star actress. What follows is a grand tale of revenge that engulfs the entire entertainment industry.

title: Roots of the Heart
summary: An elementary schooler, Usami Kyuu encounters Ichiko, a female robot trying to learn about [heart]. What awaits the two that start to live together... Boy X Robot Girl, Begin!

title: Who Kidnapped the Empress?
summary: No summary available.

title: The Handmaiden Hates Childcare
summary:
While working the regular shift in a supermarket, Ailene finds herself waking up in the body of a nanny within a fantasy novel. 

Knowing this character dies at the hands of the twin princes at the beginning of the novel, Ailene vows to raise these boys to be kindhearted and avoid their dark storyline. She fits right into her role and things seem to be looking up until the empire’s "mad dog" Duke Kasar stumbles into her life and asks her to pretend to be his lover. 

Will Ailene make it through the fantasy novel alive?!

title: Describe Your Feeling When Being Reincarnated as Your Husband’s Mistress
summary: Adrienne Trovica, the sole Grand Duchess of the Rhonta Empire, suddenly dies from a seizure and wakes up in the body of Countess Bleiah Acacia, who looks exactly like her. As it turns out, Bleiah is no ordinary woman. She was the mistress of Adrienne’s loving husband, Noevian Trovica. Adrienne, shocked by the news, attends her funeral as Bleiah to confirm the rumor. To her surprise, she sees a man crying for her at her grave. Who is this mystery man, and was everything that she knew about her husband a lie?

title: My Ex, We Meet Again
summary:
I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. 

A yuri story between two childhood friends.

title: Wail Of Weakness
summary:
Ananta, a descendant of one of the First Six Incarnates, can transform into an unstoppable brawling dragon whenever anything stands in his way. 

It's a power he'll need in his quest to exact revenge against the Wings Incarnate, a power-hungry deceiver that resembles a heavenly angel only in appearance.

title: Genius Prismatic Mage
summary: In a world where you must steal or be stolen, kill or be killed, Ray, an orphan from the 50th sector, possesses the unique ability to see mana in the form of colors. However, despite the colorful sparks that fill the world around him, his existence has been numb detachment, completely devoid of emotions. But when a life-altering event shatters the cold, unfeeling life he once knew, Ray's journey might just unfold into a story richer in color than he could have ever imagined.

title: Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: Try Begging Me
summary:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?

title: Beauty and the Beasts
summary: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.

title: The Ugly Lady’s Secret Pouch
summary:
When Yunseol wakes up as "Laila el Este" in the novel, “Bird Cage,” she is horrified.

Though Laila may be beautiful, her beauty is the reason the three male leads obsess over her and make her life a living hell. As such, Laila decides to use her professional makeup skills to become high society’s infamous ugly duckling.

But out of nowhere, she receives a marriage proposal from Duke Montefeltra, a fellow outcast who is ostracized for his unattractive looks.

Will this turn of events help Laila escape the novel’s bad ending once and for all?

title: Arrogant Regret
summary: After her noble family falls to ruin, Stella Embrose does whatever she can to make ends meet. But her departure from high society only sparks rumors about her supposed messy relationships with men. These false rumors reach the ears of Duke Callian Rochester, Stella’s unrequited first love and her husband-to-be under the emperor’s ploy to keep him in check. Believing Stella to be unworthy of him, Callian hands her a contract stating they will divorce in three years. Will this be enough time for Callian to be unblinded by his pride and see Stella for who she truly is?

title: The Sacrificial Princess Satisfies the Vampire Duke’s Thirst With Sweetness
If You Desire to Keep Me [Official]
summary: Kisa’s world shatters when she hears her fiancé Daniel has another woman. She confronts him, expecting denial but Daniel doesn’t just lie; he mocks her, calling her stupid. Betrayed and trapped by her father’s refusal to let her break the engagement, Kisa’s fate feels sealed until Seyodd, the new duke and her late brother’s replacement, steps into her life. A secret contract marriage with him becomes her only escape. Just when she thinks she’s found freedom, a chilling letter from Daniel warns her about Seyodd’s dangerous secret. What darkness is Seyodd hiding beneath his noble mask?

title: I will temporarily protect the male lead
summary:
I somehow took over the body of a villainess in a novel. Originally, I was supposed to die after coveting the male lead, but instead, I decided to become a rich unemployed woman and enjoy a life full of pleasures.

"You said you wanted to raise a puppy, so this brother went to hunt one for you. How's your brother's hunting skills?"

Until my brother came back after hunting the male lead who had turned into a wolf…
–
Having been forced to look after the male lead, I somehow succeeded in taming him after many twists and turns. Now all that's left is to look for this mysterious female lead and hand over the leash, then it will be all over. But…

"Have you become tired of me?"

"No, not at all."

"Then why do you keep trying to send me to a strange person?"

Maybe it's because he has stayed with me for too long, but it seems he has lost his social skills and has also developed separation anxiety.

"That person is someone very important to Your Highness."

"The only person who is important to me is you."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, because I've imprinted," he whispered and curved the corner of his eyes, "on you."

The half-bent, bright yellow eyes were brimming with obsession.

---
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

---

[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55937153)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%9E%84%EC%8B%9C%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8-%EC%A4%91%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3091), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60651851)

title: Black Corporation: Joseon
summary:
The maniac who was crazy about all kinds of fields such as military and steampunk had been reincarnated. However, his father was King Sejong the Great?
The mania-wise king and his crazy maniac son. Along with the ministers, and countless humans who were getting exploited.
Even today, the night of Joseon was filled with the light of overtime.

title: Reincarnated Escort Warrior
summary: Although an old porter has shown great determination and loyalty to his escort agency, he is never given the chance to become an armed escort due to his bad leg. But after sacrificing his life to keep a priceless treasure from a group of bandits, he is reborn as the 22-year-old Li Zhenglong who died 30 years ago! Now, in the body of the fourth young master of the Heavenly Dragon Escort Agency, will he finally realize his dream? Or will Li Zhenglong's terrible reputation ruin it all?

title: Difficult Boss
summary: No summary available.

title: The Empress’s Beast Selection
summary:
A collection of older oneshots that are also collected in other collections.

Volume 1:
1. "Sunde ni Touch!" in "Imadoki" Vol. 5
2. "Couple" in "Shishunki Miman Okotowari Kanketsu Hen"
3. "Hatsuki Triangle" in "Suna no Tiara"
4. "Houkago Gensou" in "Appare Jipangu" Vol. 1
5. "700 Nichi no Blue" in "Suna no Tiara"

Volume 2:

6. "Perfect Lovers" in "Musubiya Nanako"
7. "Otomoe no jijou" in "Shishuki Miman Okotowari" Vol. 3
8. "Genseika" in "Mint de Kiss me"
9. "Mint de Kiss Me" in "Mint de Kiss Me"
10. "Pajama de Ojama" in "Gomen Asobase!"
11. "Pajama de Meiro" in "Gomen Asobase!"

title: On Our Wedding Night, I Got Pregnant with the Chief Warden’s Child
Evolution Begins With A Big Tree
summary: One minute, he was choking on water, and the next, he found himself in a canyon and turned into a willow tree! Before he could reconcile with this new sad reality, the world decided to throw him another curveball. With the return of spirit energy, every living thing started to mutate, and his life was soon turned into a game of survival. Luckily, he was gifted with the ability of infinite evolution. But was it really a blessing? Or was it also a curse in disguise?

title: The Great War
summary:
Im Dajun, who was abandoned by his family and now lives as the leader of a runaway group, one day brings Yeonwoo home by chance. Yeonwoo then commits a violent rampage in Incheon. Standing in the way of Yeonwoo, who was trying to kill a chaebol chairman for revenge, is Yoon Gamin, a top student hopeful. Meanwhile, Nahwajin of the School Authority Protection Bureau watches the situation with interest...

The first crossover in the Blue String Universe! A massive showdown featuring the main characters from [True Education], [Study Group], and [How to Fight]. This is a record of an intense battle not covered in their own stories.

title: Return of the Sword God-Rank Civil Servant
summary:
The nation's buzzing about Ahn Suho, the newly awakened player who's giving up a life of riches to become a civil servant. They don't realize that Suho's been a civil servant before... in his past life before he was killed by his own team! 

Now, Suho's out to save the country from the worst of its criminal scum by gaining the strength to stop them before they can strike. 

Can Suho power up and protect the nation, even if it means starting over completely? Or will justice be thwarted once more?

title: I Became a Swordsmanship Instructor at the Academy
summary:
The protagonist is reincarnated in the body of Kang Shin-hyuk, a background character from a popular novel. Shin-hyuk decides to leave saving the world to the original protagonists and enjoy a wealthy, carefree life without interfering with the novel’s plot. 

However, he discovers discrimination against non-Hunter school graduates at the school where he works. 

To avoid being looked down upon by his fellow teachers, and to lead a comfortable life, Ayumu begins his reincarnation journey, determined to become strong enough to protect himself… even if it means slightly altering the original story.

title: The Caring Young Lady Wants to Be a Wall
summary:
Irina de Claudel was reincarnated as a background character in her favorite BL game. While she’s busy playing matchmaker to get her favorite pairing, Henri and Noel, together… She somehow ends up being loved by both of them!?
“All I ever wanted… was to be a wall between them…!”
Will Irina succeed in getting the two together in the end!? A chaotic love comedy where the heroine is adored by the very romanceable characters of a BL game!

title: MookHyang – Dark Lady
summary:
The exceptional martial artist and proud hierarch of the Demonic Sect, Mookhyang, winds up in a strange new fantasy realm after falling victim to a curse cast by his enemies, the Blood Sect. But when Mookhyang’s incredible control over qi, or mana, becomes known, it’s only a matter of time before he gets cursed again… and turned into a young lady?! 

In this world of elves, mages, knights, and dragons, will a mastery of Chinese martial arts be enough for one man (or woman) to fight his way back home? Or will this humbled warrior finally concede defeat? 

[Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_aBOSaO6uOk)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B5%ED%96%A5-%EB%8B%A4%ED%81%AC%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EB%94%94/2341)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28581)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A2%A8%E5%8A%8D%E7%95%99%E9%A6%99/59)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/31401)

- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/mookhyang-dark-lady-de)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/mookhyang-dark-lady-fr)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AE%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87_%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89/99)
---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/89958058)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=237680077)

title: Number One Beast Master
summary:
Minamino Chinatsu is a beautiful girl who's incredibly popular and easygoing. Ever since I met her in the fall of my first year of high school, my life has been anything but ordinary. It all changed when another guy with the same name as me showed up at school – a handsome one, no less – and suddenly my classmates started calling me 'Number Two.'

"You're not 'Number Two' to me," she said. "Besides, it's me who wants to kiss you first."

My relationship with Chinatsu goes beyond just school. We play street basketball after class, cook meals together, share secrets, and even grow physically closer. I thought I was fine being alone, but she accepts me for who I am. And because of that, I want to give her the same in return.

This is a coming-of-age love story about realizing how precious even the simplest desires can be.

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Don’t Pay Attention to The Villainess
The Child of Sin is the Beloved Bride of the Ice Lion
I Was Reincarnated as a Villainous Young Lady, but I Have No Desire to Get Married!
I Don’t Need You Anymore
summary:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

title: At the End of the Hidden Greenery
summary:
She dedicated five years of her life serving as the Akarna of the temple while she was the crown prince’s lover.

“Do you not understand? If you cannot give birth to an heir, then you can’t become the empress. It’s just… It’s just a political marriage. But you must understand that I love only you.”

And yet, it’s as if he gave her something that’s perhaps nothing more than alms—the position of a concubine.

‘Are you telling me that you’re going to marry another woman and make me a concubine? And you’re expecting me to just accept that?’

When the carriage she was riding in rushed towards a cliff, she impulsively let herself fall. And when she opened her eyes again, she found herself at that place.

The forest where the empire’s most despised species lived.

title: The Substitute Adopted Daughter is Finally Free!
The Silent Sacrifice Princess And The Black Dragons Marriage
summary:
Ayame, born into a family of priestesses blessed by the Black Dragon God, possesses a unique ability to heal people through her voice. However, after the death of her parents, she is taken in by her uncle's family who mistreat her, leading to the loss of her voice. Her cousin Mari even takes over Ayame’s rightful position as priestess, and Ayame is eventually offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why must I be killed like this?! Someone, please help me!"

Her desperate plea brought forth the Black Dragon from the sky. He descends and transforms into a handsome young man, gently takes Ayame's hand, and flies away with her.

Thus begins Ayame’s new life as the bride of Saku, the Black Dragon, living in his mansion situated between the celestial and human worlds. However, Ayame’s cousin Mari, envious of her new status as the beautiful bride of the Black Dragon schemes to steal him away...

A Japanese-style Cinderella story of a gentle-hearted girl who lost her voice and a proud yet compassionate Black Dragon.

---
The Kozuki family was granted the Black Dragon's blessing, allowing them to heal the sick and purify impurity with their voices alone. But Ayame's life shatters after her parents' death, leaving her at the mercy of her cruel aunt and uncle, who tortured her until she lost her voice. As their daughter, Mari, rises to become the new priestess, Ayame is offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why do I have to die like this? Please help me!"

In response to her desperate plea, the Black Dragon appears as a striking man and takes her hand, whisking her away to his realm. Chosen to be the bride of the Black Dragon Saku, Ayame finds herself in the enchanting Black Dragon Manor, suspended between the heavens and the human world. But jealousy ignites in Mari, who vows to reclaim Saku and make Ayame suffer once more.

title: Death Penalty
summary:
In the present day, tower dungeons called Magic Towers have appeared throughout the world.

Takamichi Yoshito is a convenience store clerk. The manager yells at him every day, making his life miserable. Yoshito dreams of making a fortune, and soon after the Magic Towers appear. He becomes a Challenger of the towers, but he has no savings to invest in weapons or equipment, leaving him completely late to the game.

Aiming for a quick turnaround, Yoshito sells his real-life savings and the few items he has in the tower, and buys the [Infinite Revival] skill from a shady merchant. This skill allows him to revive himself within the dungeon. However, [Infinite Revival] had a hidden disadvantage.

When reviving, the user is randomly given a [Death Penalty], a permanent debuff so strong that once it is applied, the user is no longer able to work as an adventurer. Yoshito despairs over the cursed skill, but his situation changes drastically when he obtains the rare skill [Inversion] in a hidden room of the dungeon.

The skill [Inversion] reversed the heavy negative effects of [Death Penalty]'s permanent debuff caused by Infinite Revival and turned them all into positive stats!

title: Holy Emperor’s Grandson Is A Necromancer
summary: After a near-death experience, something has changed about the Holy Emperor’s troublemaker of a grandson. To be precise, his body was taken over by a Korean man who died while playing a VR video game! But when his necromancer character is mixed with a Holy Prince’s blood, things start getting funky. The zombies he makes are incredibly nice, his curses start healing people, and the girl he saved from being turned into a zombie suddenly gains super strength. Now he has to play the hero, but he’d really rather just go for a nap.

title: Tyrant of the Otherworld Prison: My Shadow Can Evolve Infinitely
summary: In the year 2035, rifts to alien realms tore through the world’s defenses. Swarms of insectoids and beastkin ravaged the land, and humanity struggled to survive through the strength of “Evolvers.” Li Yi was betrayed by his teammates during an attack by alien beings and left for dead. On the brink of death, he awakened the “Titan Shadow” System—his shadow could evolve without limits! It could devour ores to enhance defense, tear through enemies to form deadly blades, and even split into an army of shadow soldiers… From insect hives to haunted lands, wherever his shadow passed, enemies were shredded into pulp. This is the revenge of the weak—begun with a shadow that devours all.
